Body: Possible Duplicate:  Where can I find stock or custom ROMs for my Android device?  A quick search shows that I'm the only one on this site with an LG Optimus U, or the only person who's ever curious about them, but maybe I'm wrong.I was wondering, does anyone know of any custom firmware / ROMs for the Optimus U? There are a ton for it's brothers, Optimus T, Optimus V, Vortex, Phoenix and Thrive, but none for poor little US Cellular, as far as I can find. :(
Title: Is there any custom firmware for the LG Optimus U?
